description: The xNetworking module is a part of the DSC Resource Kit, which is a collection of DSC Resources produced by the PowerShell Team. This module contains the xIPAddress and xDnsServerAddress resources that allow configuration of a node’s IP Address and DNS Server Address.
displayName: xNetworking Module – PowerShell Desired State Configuration Resource Kit
